2025-12-23.title: DAILY
2025-12-23.message: Each day presents new challenges, but God’s mercy is renewed every morning.
2025-12-23.reflection: Reflect on trusting God today and relying on Him.

2026-01-26.title: GOD OF WONDERS
2026-01-26.message: God’s word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
2026-01-26.reflection: Let His word guide your daily choices.
